content: {"name": "Mecklenburg County-SNAP Assistance (Billingsley Rd.)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" http://www.ncdhhs.gov/sunbucksapplication\nMecklenburg County Department of Social Services Food and Nutrition Services provides assistance to households with limited income and resources.\u202fLimits are different, depending on the number and ages of persons in the home. The benefit amount is based on the amount of income available to the household members who buy and cook their food together. Benefits cannot be used to purchase items such as detergents, paper products, tobacco products, or alcoholic beverages.", "email": "", "url": "https://cfas.mecknc.gov/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "301 Billingsley Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Grier Heights", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28211", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.1916202, "longitude": -80.8065432}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 336-3000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}]}
